TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateScriptTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class GenerateScriptTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class GenerateScriptTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定伺服程式類型必須在 Proxy 物件中產生。

span.span: Specifies that the server type must be generated in the proxy object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用 AJAX 的 ASP.NET 網站中，ASP.NET 可以自動產生的 Web 服務類別方法的 proxy 物件。In AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web sites, ASP.NET can automatically generate proxy objects for methods of a Web service class. 它會針對大部分的輸入的參數和傳回值會標記為任何 Web 方法的最上層型別。It does this for most top-level types for the input parameters and return values of any Web methods that are marked with . 在其他情況下，如果您的 proxy 物件產生的伺服器類型，您必須套用手動。In other cases, if you proxy objects generated for server types, you must apply manually. 您可以套用至 Web 服務本身，或任何 web 服務方法或`static`頁面方法標示為。You can apply to the Web service itself or to any Web service method or `static` page method marked with . 在某些情況下，即使類型會對應至輸入的參數或傳回值的 Web 服務方法，proxy 將不會自動產生。In some cases, even if the type corresponds to an input parameter or return value of a Web service method, the proxy will not be generated automatically. 在此情況下，您必須使用來產生 proxy 物件類型的屬性。In that case, you must use the attribute to generate the proxy object for the type. 這會發生泛型型別及陣列，具有一個以上的引數，例如`Dictionary>`。This occurs for generic types and arrays that have more than one argument, such as `Dictionary>`. 一或多個執行個體的可以套用至 Web 服務類別或方法。One or more instances of can be applied to a Web service class or method. ASP.NET 會隨後產生每個最上層型別所參考的每個宣告的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxy 類別。ASP.NET will then generate an ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxy class for each top-level type that is referenced by each declaration of . > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要產生 proxy 物件的巢狀類型，您必須手動套用給每個巢狀類型。If you want to generate proxy objects for nested types, you must manually apply to each nested type. ASP.NET 會產生最上層型別的 proxy，並不會不會自動以遞迴方式將屬性套用至巢狀型別。ASP.NET generates proxies only for top-level types and does not automatically recursively apply the attribute to nested types. 如需如何使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用至 Web 服務類別和 Web 方法。The following example shows how to apply to a Web service class and to a Web method. 如此一來，`ColorObject`類型和其巢狀的類型`FavoriteColors`隨附的 proxy 物件。As a result, the `ColorObject` type and its nested type `FavoriteColors` are included in the proxy object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type
param.span: 要包含在 Proxy 類別中的型別。

span.span: The type to include in the proxy class.

summary.span: 為指定的型別初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是選擇性具名參數，這個建構函式。The property is an optional named parameter for this constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來產生 proxy 物件，指定中繼資料標記使用特定類型的識別項的類型。The following example shows how to use to generate a proxy object for the specified type that uses a specific type identifier for the metadata marker.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ScriptTypeId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定型別中繼資料標記的型別識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the type identifier for the type metadata marker.

value.span: 型別中繼資料標記的型別識別項，位於序列化的「JavaScript 物件標記法」(JSON) 字串上。

span.span: The type identifier for the type metadata marker on the serialized JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string.

value.span: 預設值為型別的組件限定名稱。

span.span: The default value is the assembly-qualified name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是選擇性的屬性。This is an optional property. 如果指定，則值的上序列化的 JSON 字串而非組件限定類型名稱用於型別中繼資料標記 ("__type")。If specified, the value of is used for the type metadata marker ("__type") on the serialized JSON string instead of the assembly-qualified name of the type. 還原序列化期間類型解析程式，都與物件會使用對應回適當的 managed 類型的型別中繼資料標記值。During deserialization, the type resolver that is associated with the object will use the type metadata marker value to map back to the appropriate managed type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As Type
public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 Proxy 物件中包含的型別。

span.span: Gets the type that is included in the proxy object.

value.span: 所產生 Proxy 物件中包含的型別物件。

span.span: The type object that is included in the generated proxy object.
